FuncDef: The reset max-onlineusers command clears the maximum number of concurrent online users recorded by the system.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot number of the interface board.
-

Specifies a domain of which the maximum number of concurrent online users recorded by the system is to be cleared.
The value is a string of 1 to 64 characters.

ExtraInfo: To view the maximum number of concurrent online users recorded by the system in a coming period, run the reset max-onlineusers command to clear the existing records. Then, the system starts to collect statistics from zero.
